entities.description: The main character of the story, who is being held paralyzed against a wall.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A character who tells Harry to leave quickly and forces Malfoy through the door.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Death Eater who is forced by Snape to leave the Tower top.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: A Death Eater who follows Malfoy and the brother and sister through the door.

entities.name: the squat brother and sister
entities.description: Two individuals who are described as being short in stature.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who are fighting against Harry and his friends.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that allows the wearer to become invisible.

entities.name: petrificus totalus
entities.description: A spell cast by Harry to immobilize a Death Eater.

relationships.description: Harry throws the Invisibility Cloak aside as he is running down the staircase.
Snape forces Malfoy through the door ahead of the rest.
Harry casts the Petrificus Totalus spell to immobilize a Death Eater.
The Death Eater is affected by the Petrificus Totalus spell and falls to the ground.
